text:
change of plans are calls and texts. Please work with me and quit playing games. I know you are leaving soon.

I will pick up Adrian and his friend after basketball practice which finishes at 8pm. It is my night so I will do that

knows the plan

That is not what we agreed to. And the whole fight was because you wanted to be sure the world knows we are getting a divorce before Adrian does.
So he can find out that way. At least we know he is doing great mentally, so screwing with his head for your own selfish PR belittlement campaign
make sense. For last minute change of plans we are supposed to coordinate on text or calls. You have played games all evening now. You are really
frustrating to work with.

We both got triggered. Let’s stop it all. I am good not to revisit any of this tbh.
